item.title: Trump Sends Tom Homan to Minneapolis
item.description: Dispatching Homan to the scene is, it appears, an attempt to dial down tension and reset the mission.

item.title: The Scale of the Iranian Massacre Comes into View
item.description: In securing its survival through slaughter, the Iranian regime has sacrificed its tenuous remaining claims to legitimacy.

item.title: A Conservative’s Guide to the 2026 Best Picture Nominees
item.description: The outrage peddlers will tell you the Best Picture category is a wasteland. It isn’t.

item.title: Congress Can Change the Cancer Story with a Vote
item.description: An early-detection blood test, if covered by Medicare, could save money and lives.

item.title: President Trump Can Make the Americas Great Again
item.description: After several years of a U.S. in retreat, the Monroe Doctrine is experiencing a resurgence.
